Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A figure in casual attire is busy in the workshop.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The person turning around reveals a stern face.'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Lee...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'By the look on your face, I bet you thought I was that hot-blooded idiot, Kamui.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I would've suggested you turn around and go make preparations for submitting the workshop reconstruction plan.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Looking at the general mental abilities of living beings, I'd say you're probably capable of meeting the standards of a normal human.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "This frame is equipped with the latest tech coating produced after Kamui's latest batch of frames.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It was made on the same assembly line, so maybe it has slightly altered my appearance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Looks sharp!', 3: '18', 4: 'The new Lee will take some getting used to...', 5: '19'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...It's not just for cosmetics. At least this new frame has significantly improved combat capabilities.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just close your eyes or be patient. At least, this new frame has significantly improved combat capabilities.', 4: '1'}
{2: "At least? What don't you like about it?", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '"Like" is a human construct. I just need some time to get used to it or at least modify it a bit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you modifying it yourself?', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Only Nanami and Kamui use the workshop for training. I'm obviously here for assembly and modification purposes.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's awesome, Lee!", 3: '25', 4: "You don't think it's a problem modifying yourself?", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Seeing as it's my area of expertise, it allows me to put my skills to the test.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I run a few small risks, though. My M.I.N.D. may go berserk and I'll become a blood-thirsty killing machine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You call that SMALL?!', 3: '29', 4: "You've got to be joking.", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Isn't it obvious?", 4: '1'}
